itunes:title: Episode 690 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/06/20 - We Want Bama!
title: Episode 690 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/06/20 - We Want Bama!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how Alabama football is back and feared again, the NLDS and ALDS MLB playoffs and who has the best shot at the World Series, why no one is watching the NBA Finals, why the Big 12 is already out of the CFP conversat...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how Alabama football is back and feared again, the NLDS and ALDS MLB playoffs and who has the best shot at the World Series, why no one is watching the NBA Finals, why the Big 12 is already out of the CFP conversation already, plus we give you this week's NFL and College spreads including our lock's of the week.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
